markdownRemark.html:
Make routines adaptable to the most likely potential scenarios. Much of time is being dictated by outside factors and those are largely beyond anyoneâ€™s control. Everyone is working to find new schedules and that will mean many changes.

Create routines that can be easily adapted to keep some level of normalcy and productivity.

frontmatter.title: Adaptable routines
